SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
EINSTEIN GENERATIVE AI
Create a Field Generation Prompt Template

A Field Generation prompt template brings generative AI-assisted workflows to fields within Lightning record pages. Enable your users to populate a field with a summary or description created by an LLM to facilitate more productive conversations with your customers.

REQUIRED EDITIONS AND USER PERMISSIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise, Performance, and Unlimited Editions with the Einstein for Sales, Einstein for Platform, or Einstein for Service add-on


USER PERMISSIONS NEEDED
To create and manage prompt templates in Prompt Builder:	Prompt Template Manager permission set

To create a field generation prompt template:

From Setup, in the Quick Find box, enter Prompt Builder, and then select Prompt Builder.
Click New Prompt Template.
In the Prompt Template Type dropdown, select Field Generation.
Specify your Prompt Template Name.
Select an Object containing the field that you want Einstein to populate.
NOTE To add a field generation prompt template to a Lightning record page, you must enable Dynamic Forms, which support most, but not all, standard LWC-enabled objects. For a list of LWC-enabled objects, see LWC Migration for Record Home Pages. After you finish creating the prompt template, you can enable Dynamic Forms. See Add a Field Generation Prompt Template to a Lightning Record Page.
Select an Object Field. This field is the one that you want Einstein to populate.
Optionally, you can write a Description for your prompt template.
Click Create, and you’re redirected to the Prompt Template Workspace.
In the Prompt Template Workspace, create your prompt template, preview it, and see the LLM’s response.
In the Prompt Preview section, select a Record. Available options depend on which object you selected on the New Prompt Template page.
Click Save & Preview, and review the Response.
Add Record Merge Fields to a Field Generation Prompt Template
Save time with templates that use specific information from your Salesforce objects to create case summaries, and more, at scale. Use merge fields in a field generation prompt template to have an LLM write content using up-to-the-minute data.
Add Flow Merge Fields Without Data Cloud Objects to a Field Generation Prompt Template
Create and preview an example field generation prompt template that uses a flow without Data Cloud objects.
Add Flow Merge Fields with Data Cloud Objects to a Field Generation Prompt Template
Build a flow that uses unified Data Cloud object data to get a 360-degree view of an account, and then add a flow merge field to your prompt template.
Add Apex Merge Fields to a Field Generation Prompt Template
Create an example field generation prompt template that uses Apex.
